@description.name: @description
@description.body: Interface for a column menu item corresponding to a table column.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Dispatched when a column changes visibility state. The event data is a boolean indicating whether the table column associated with this menu item is now visible.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property columnVisible. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #columnVisible}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property columnVisible. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #columnVisible}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property columnVisible. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #columnVisible}.
